SEO_TAGS.TITLE: Stor Awning - Simplicity and Functionality for Small Spaces
SEO_TAGS.DESCRIPTION: Discover the simplicity and functionality of the Stor Awning. Ideal for balconies and small terraces, offering space-saving design and customization options.

HERO_SECTION.TITLE: Stor Awning
HERO_SECTION.HEADLINE: Simplicity and Functionality for Small Spaces

HIGHLIGHTS.TITLE: Space Saving
HIGHLIGHTS.DESCRIPTION: Discreet design that does not invade space, similar to a blind

HIGHLIGHTS.TITLE: Customizable
HIGHLIGHTS.DESCRIPTION: Two positions, with the arms extended or folded

HIGHLIGHTS.TITLE: Recommended Fabric: Light-Colored Acrylics
HIGHLIGHTS.DESCRIPTION: Already has good air circulation, just choose the color

DESCRIPTION_SECTION.TITLE: Description
PARRAGRAPHS: The stor awning stands out for its aesthetic simplicity, quick installation, and easy manual operation. Designed especially for balconies and small terraces, this model is custom-made to make the most of your outdoor space with shade.

Its aluminum arms, equipped with springs, fold discreetly against the load bar when not in use. When the awning is extended, the arms are fixed to the railing with a pin hook system, providing greater resistance and stability.
Once fixed, the stor awning allows you to continue lowering the fabric to move the load bar outward. This facilitates the entry of light and ventilation and offers a clear view of the street.
